articles.author: Sophie Kiderlin
articles.title: European Union votes to impose tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles - CNBC
articles.description: European Union member states on Friday voted in favor of the European Commission's proposal to impose definitive tariffs on battery electric vehicles from China.
articles.content:
Employees work on an electric vehicle (EV) production line at the Leapmotor factory in Jinhua, China's eastern Zhejiang province on September 18, 2024.
